content.prompt: Samuelsonâ€™s characterization of the town of Le Creusot in 1836 in the second paragraph best illustrates which of the following developments?

choices.label: The continuation of outdated agricultural practices and food shortages in undeveloped areas of Europe
The lag in industrialization of Continental Europe as compared with Great Britain
The negative effects of rapid urban growth
The creation of new social classes associated with industrialization

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
